location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Coll 29/81 'Tehran Legation: supply of wireless set'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 46; these numbers are written in pencil and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file concerns the supply of a new wireless receiving set for the British Legation at Tehran, and the Foreign Office's request that Indian Revenues share the expenses.The file is composed of correspondence between the British Legation at Tehran, the Foreign Office, the India Office, and the Office of Works.
